description: The Red Alimentos Cooperativos Patagonicos, initiated before the pandemic, connects various organizations, cooperatives, and associations in Patagonia to address food distribution challenges. It emerged to link producers with urban communities lacking access to fresh, quality food. Emphasizing agroecology and community cooperation, the network fosters direct relationships between consumers and local farmers, promoting sustainable practices and regional identity. Through collective purchasing, it aims to support local agriculture while ensuring fair access to nutritious food for all.
name: Red Alimentos Cooperativos Patagonicos
